thread.title: Ted Cruz Likes Guns, Bacon, Trolling Democrats
thread.title_full: Ted Cruz Likes Guns, Bacon, Trolling Democrats | The Daily Caller

author: dailycaller
title: Ted Cruz Likes Guns, Bacon, Trolling Democrats
text:
4663829 I’m not a huge fan of these sorts of please-make-this-viral videos, but this one’s okay. At least this time Ted Cruz isn’t doing characters from The Simpsons . And I appreciate any wacky-Republican video that doesn’t feature Lindsey Graham.
It’s already having the desired effect:
What a coincidence that people who hate everything America stands for also hate Ted Cruz.
Advantage: Cruz!
